scripts.clean:macos: find . -name '.DS_Store' -type f -delete && find . -name '._*' -type f -delete && find ./target -name '._*' -type f -delete
scripts.lint: pnpm run clean:macos && pnpm run biome && pnpm run mdlint && pnpm run lint:trunk
scripts.rust:build: COPYFILE_DISABLE=1 pnpm run clean:macos && COPYFILE_DISABLE=1 cargo build --manifest-path rust-backend/Cargo.toml
scripts.rust:test: COPYFILE_DISABLE=1 pnpm run clean:macos && COPYFILE_DISABLE=1 cargo test --manifest-path rust-backend/Cargo.toml
scripts.rust:run: COPYFILE_DISABLE=1 pnpm run clean:macos && COPYFILE_DISABLE=1 cargo run --manifest-path rust-backend/Cargo.toml
scripts.dev: COPYFILE_DISABLE=1 pnpm run clean:macos && COPYFILE_DISABLE=1 vite
scripts.build: COPYFILE_DISABLE=1 pnpm run clean:macos && COPYFILE_DISABLE=1 vite build
scripts.preview: COPYFILE_DISABLE=1 pnpm run clean:macos && COPYFILE_DISABLE=1 vite preview
scripts.tauri:build: COPYFILE_DISABLE=1 pnpm run clean:macos && COPYFILE_DISABLE=1 pnpm tauri build # Use Yarn only for edge cases (see README)
scripts.tauri:dev: COPYFILE_DISABLE=1 pnpm run clean:macos && COPYFILE_DISABLE=1 pnpm tauri dev # Use Yarn only for edge cases (see README)
scripts.biome: biome check --no-errors-on-unmatched stack-ui/src scripts vite.config.ts vitest.setup.ts package.json
scripts.trunk:upgrade: trunk upgrade || (curl -fsSL https://get.trunk.io -o install-trunk.sh && bash install-trunk.sh -y)
